column4: I'm trying to install the drivers for a nvidia fx 5700 ve (which ubuntu 9.10 recognizes, even recognized it during the demo of ubuntu before i installed it), now that i installed it (lets me choose between windows and ubuntu), it still recognized the video card but won't install it...what happened?
to install nvidia drivers, perhaps you should try envy? that's what i use, makes it easy and just seems to work
yes, but you might wanna check envy's site. just google envy ubuntu, you'll find it :)
